name: JOB LOSS PROTECTION OF AMERICA, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Lobby Congress (House Financial Services, Senate Banking) and Executive Branch agencies (FHFA, Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, VA, HUD) to promote innovative mortgage insurance product.
